SEARCH
Package koopa.core.sources

Class BasicSource

java.lang.Object
koopa.core.sources.BasicSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Source
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChainingSource, LineSplitter, NullSource, Pipe, StackOfSources, TreeSource
public abstract class BasicSource extends Object implements Source
Base for implementing a Source. It takes care of the undo behaviour, allowing subclasses to focus on the generation.

    • unshift

      public void unshift(Data packet)
      Description copied from interface: Source
      Return a piece of data to this source, so that it becomes available again to be read. This is basically an "undo" option for Source.next().
      Specified by:
      unshift in interface Source

    • getSource

      public <S extends Source> S getSource(Class<S> clazz)
      Description copied from interface: Source
      If this is a source of a matching class type, return this. If not, look for it upstream.
